entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A person that Harry is interested in, mentioned as someone he wants to impress.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who gave Harry strange advice about taking a bath.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: A building at Hogwarts where Gryffindor students live.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The guardian of the entrance to Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: wailing egg
entities.description: An object that is mentioned as being mysterious and needing to be understood by Harry.

entities.name: bath
entities.description: A place where Cedric advised Harry to take a bath.

relationships.description: Harry is interested in Cho and wants to impress her.
Cedric gave Harry strange advice about taking a bath.
Ron and Hermione are having a blazing row.
Harry walked back to Gryffindor Tower alone.
The Fat Lady and her friend Vieve were snoozing in the picture over the portrait hole.
Harry is trying to understand what the wailing egg means.
